name: Mottera Magica
description:
Rin loves the forest and strolling through the night while being guided by her little friends, the Mottera.

Go with Rin on a short and relaxing adventure, find all her friends and reach the top where you can see a clear night sky. Maybe you can find some gems on the way too?

Controls :                   

Actions
KeyboardController MoveA / D
Left Stick 
JumpSpaceButton South
Pause
Escape
Start

Install instructions (only Windows) :

  1. Download .zip
  2. Unpack .zip
  3. Play the game!

Made with Unity

All sounds are from epidemicsound

This game was developed as part of HTK Aacademy's game creation class. My first game! :)
